attributes.action: Set an example by ensuring correct English is used in all communications from your office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What chance do the nation have when emails from the Prime Minister's own office use 'affect' when they mean 'effect', use redundancies like 'now currently' etc.  These examples are taken from just one email (the response to the request that the tax gap between low and high emmission cars be made greater).
The BBC may have given up on the English language but surely it is the government's job to set an example, especially now teachers are employed who cannot use English correctly?
